sentence: Fox News host and former GOP politician Trey Gowdy has asked Rep. Madison Cawthorn to reveal who in DC's elite did drugs in front of him and invited him to sex parties or admit that he was lying.
author: Cheryl Teh
title: Fox News host says Madison Cawthorn needs to name those involved in orgies and drugs, or admit to making up stories about DC's elite

sentence: GOP Rep. Madison Cawthorn said he missed 15 House votes because he was fulfilling his 'service as a husband'.
title: Does Cawthorn Know that Votes are Public Record?
